name: Generate Internal Link Structure Playground游릭游릭

parameters.content:
## Usage

Run this on a self hosted n8n instance

Call this webhook endpoint with a `query` as `url` eg 

`https://dev.funautomations.io/webhook/4a85c711-d?url=funautomations.io`

- You might need to install each of these axios
cheerio

- Enable external modules on your n8n by adding these settings to your ENV before you can run this workflow

`NODE_FUNCTION_ALLOW_BUILTIN=*
 NODE_FUNCTION_ALLOW_EXTERNAL=*`

Read More on  https://funautomation.notion.site/Generate-Sitemap-15dd3b4768e2802195aae81ea3f279a4?pvs=4
